cards.name: Cute Little Skulls
cards.description:
Deal 6 (9) damage.
skulmod:Bonepile 2 (4).

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 (8) Block.

cards.name: Let's...Knit...
cards.description:
You and the target gain 5 (8) Block.
skulmod:Bonepile 3 (4).

cards.name: Little Bone
cards.description:
skulmod:Passive: Take 1 less damage.
skulmod:Bonepile: Gain 2 Block.
skulmod:Swap: Gain [E] [E] .

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 (9) damage.

cards.name: Abyss Spike
cards.description:
Deal 4 (6) damage.
Becomes Abyss Orb (+) in your hand.

cards.name: Acceleration
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When you draw this card, draw 2 (3) cards and discard this. Next time, exhaust this instead.

cards.name: Ascender's Bane
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Ethereal.
Cannot be removed from your deck.

cards.name: Awakening
cards.description:
skulmod:Bleached. Ethereal.
Deal 3 non-attack damage 0 times, equal to your Vigor, and remove it.

cards.name: Boar Chase
cards.description:
Retain. skulmod:Grapple.
Deal 2 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bull Fight
cards.description:
Retain. skulmod:Grapple.
Deal 2 (4) damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ceremonial Weapon
cards.description: Create a new  (Upgraded) Unrivaled Strike on the left of your hand.

cards.name: Fire!
cards.description:
skulmod:Bleached.
Deal 1 damage (2 times).
Purge.

cards.name: Green Dragon Crescent
cards.description: The Unrivaled Strike will skulmod:Bonepile 3 (4) times.

cards.name: Hibernation
cards.description:
Retain. skulmod:Bleached.
Apply 10 (16) skulmod:Frozen.
Purge.

cards.name: Hydra Slam
cards.description:
Retain. skulmod:Grapple.
Deal 2 (3) damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hydra Slam
cards.description:
Retain. skulmod:Grapple.
Deal 2 (3) damage~~-  to ALL enemies -~~ .
Exhaust.

cards.name: Laughing Arrow
cards.description: Switch the Unrivaled Strike between dealing damage and gaining Block.

cards.name: Lion Hunt
cards.description:
Retain. skulmod:Grapple.
Deal 2 (3) damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Loaded Dice
cards.description:
Ethereal. Purge.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).
Your next attack this turn deals 7 (14)% more damage.

cards.name: Matter Of State
cards.description: Discard the Unrivaled Strike to gain 10 (15) Block. If it was Blocking, gain 10 (15) Block next turn.

cards.name: Parasol Charge
cards.description:
The Unrivaled Strike deals 5 (8) more damage.
If it was Blocking, double this.

cards.name: Peerless Blow
cards.description:
The Unrivaled Strike hits one enemy, costs 1 more, and refunds double its cost.
If it was Blocking, gain 2 (3) Temporary Strength.

cards.name: Recall Head
cards.description:
Gain 5 (8) Block.
Channel 2 (3) skulmod:Empty_Head. 
Becomes Throw Head (+) in your hand.

cards.name: Six Generals, Five Passes
cards.description: Exhaust the Unrivaled Strike to draw 2 (3) cards. If it was Blocking, draw 3 more.

cards.name: Skeleton-Bomber
cards.description: Given that he's not supposed to be exposed like this, he's a little afraid right now.

cards.name: Strategy Book
cards.description:
Retain. Exhaust.
Your Leftmost Unrivaled Strike gains 1 of 3 effects, otherwise make one.

cards.name: Strength of 10,000
cards.description: The Unrivaled Strike will apply Strength 1 (2) more time (times).

cards.name: Tiger General
cards.description: Exhaust the Unrivaled Strike to gain 2 (3) Strength. If it was Blocking, gain double.

cards.name: Unrivaled Strike
cards.description: Deal 4 (6) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Abyss Orb
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Deal 4 (6) damage.
Becomes Abyss Spike (+) in your hand.

cards.name: Bribe
cards.description:
skulmod:Pay 20 (10) Gold.
skulmod:Bonepile 2.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Brittle Bones
cards.description:
Gain 2 (3) Frail.
Gain 4 (6) Thorns.

cards.name: Fire Arrow
cards.description:
Deal 2 (3) damage.
Apply 4 (6) skulmod:Burn. If the target is already Burned, remove it and gain half as much Vigor instead.

cards.name: Hunt
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When drawn, play the top card of your draw pile and discard (replace)  (it with) a random card (in your hand).

cards.name: Hunter
cards.description:
skulmod:Passive: Attacks Channel an skulmod:Arrow.
skulmod:Bonepile: Channel 1 skulmod:Arrow.
skulmod:Swap: Gain an empty orb slot.

cards.name: Pattern  Recognition
cards.description:
Apply 2 (3) Weak.
Channel 2 (3) skulmod:Empty_Head.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Power Strike
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage.
Costs 1 (2) less when skulmod:Charged.

cards.name: Prepare For Boarding!
cards.description: Discard 1 (up) card (to)  (2 cards) to gain 8 (10) Block (for each).

cards.name: Shield Bash
cards.description:
Deal 4 (7) damage.
Gain 4 (7) Block.

cards.name: Shield Smash
cards.description:
Deal 0 damage, based on your current Block.
skulmod:Bonepile 1 (3).

cards.name: Siege Shot
cards.description:
Deal 2 (3) damage.
Apply that much Lock-On.

cards.name: Skeleton-Shield
cards.description:
skulmod:Passive: Dexterity doubles as Thorns.
skulmod:Bonepile: Channel 1 skulmod:Barrier.
skulmod:Swap: Gain 5 Dexterity until next turn.

cards.name: Slot Machine
cards.description: skulmod:Bonepile  between 0 and 4 (5) times.

cards.name: Start the Match!
cards.description:
Innate.
skulmod:Bonepile 2 (4).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Starter Kit
cards.description:
Innate.
Gain 7 (10) Gold.
Apply 7 (10) skulmod:Ripped_Pocket.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Street Thievery
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Gain 5 (7) Gold.
After gaining 24 Gold, also gain 6 Block.

cards.name: Striking Charge
cards.description:
Gain 3 (4) Vigor.
skulmod:Bonepile 3 (4).

cards.name: Throw Head
cards.description:
Deal 3 (6) damage.
Channel 2 (3) skulmod:Empty_Head.
Becomes Recall Head (+) in your discard pile.

cards.name: Warrior
cards.description:
skulmod:Passive: Gain [E] after playing a Strike.
skulmod:Bonepile: Gain 1 skulmod:Charge.
skulmod:Swap: Gain 5 skulmod:Charge.

cards.name: Werewolf
cards.description:
skulmod:Passive: Deal damage equal to your skulmod:Total_Cards when Reshuffling.
skulmod:Bonepile: Draw and randomly discard 1 card.
skulmod:Swap: Reshuffle.

cards.name: Backroll
cards.description:
skulmod:Pay 20 (10) Gold.
Gain 8 (12) Block.
Apply 6 (10) skulmod:Ripped_Pocket.

cards.name: Backstab
cards.description: Deal 5 (8) damage, then gain the same amount of Gold up to 15 (25).

cards.name: Backstep Shot
cards.description:
Gain 7 (11) Block.
Channel 1 (2) skulmod:Arrow (Arrows).

cards.name: Birth Of A Hero
cards.description:
Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain 3 (5) Block.
Add a random skulmod:Grapple to your hand.

cards.name: Black Jack
cards.description: Add 2 Loaded Dice to your hand.

cards.name: Bombs Away!
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage and gain Block equal to the unblocked damage dealt.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Chain Strike
cards.description:
Deal 4 (6) damage.
Return this card to your hand whenever you play a Strike except Chain Strike.

cards.name: Clown
cards.description:
skulmod:Passive: Your first card each turn costs 0.
skulmod:Bonepile: Add an skulmod:Imitation to your hand.
skulmod:Swap: Bonepile 2.

cards.name: Dark Paladin
cards.description:
skulmod:Passive: Fully Blocking grants 4 skulmod:Oblivion.
skulmod:Bonepile: skulmod:Grit 2.
skulmod:Swap: Gain 8 Oblivion.

cards.name: Dark Sanctuary
cards.description:
Take 4 damage 3 (4) times.
Gain 24 (32) Block.

cards.name: Dark Wave
cards.description:
Gain 4X (5X) Block.
Gain 2X (4X) skulmod:Oblivion.

cards.name: Dirty Smash
cards.description:
Deal 12 (16) damage.
While in Wrath, deal damage again and exit Wrath.

cards.name: Dominate
cards.description:
Deal 5 (8) damage.
Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.

cards.name: Doomed Dance
cards.description: Gain 5 (7) Block each turn. If you take unblocked damage, that Block becomes Poison (Constrict).

cards.name: Everwinter
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Channel 1 skulmod:Blizzard
Channel 1 skulmod:Blizzard at the start of the turn.

cards.name: Full Charge
cards.description:
Gain 1 (2) Focus.
Gain 1 (2) Temporary Focus.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gambler
cards.description:
skulmod:Passive: skulmod:Gamble when you play cards.
skulmod:Bonepile: Shuffle a Loaded Dice into your draw pile.
skulmod:Swap: Passive chance doubles this turn.

cards.name: Great Warlock
cards.description:
skulmod:Passive: Attack damage applies Concentration.
skulmod:Bonepile: Reduce ALL skulmod:Concentration.
skulmod:Swap: Remove ALL Concentration.

cards.name: Lower The Anchor!
cards.description: Discard a card to skulmod:Bonepile 3 (4).

cards.name: Mage
cards.description:
skulmod:Passive: Skills grant 2 Vigor.
skulmod:Bonepile: Apply skulmod:Burn randomly.
skulmod:Swap: Create an Awakening.

cards.name: Momentum Strike
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Deals 2 (3) more damage each time it's drawn or discarded.

cards.name: One-Inch Punch
cards.description:
Become Entangled unless you're in Wrath.
skulmod:Bonepile 6 (8).
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Petty Thief
cards.description:
skulmod:Passive: Gaining Gold randomly deals that much damage.
skulmod:Bonepile: Gain 4 Gold.
skulmod:Swap: Block damage with twice as much Gold this turn.

cards.name: Piercing Shot
cards.description:
Target loses 4 (6) HP.
This HP loss scales as damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Predation
cards.description:
Deal 5 (6) damage.
If Fatal, raise your Max HP by 5 (8).
Fleeting.

cards.name: Price Of Power
cards.description:
Gain 2 (4) Block each turn.
Apply 1 (2) Thorns.

cards.name: Quick Step
cards.description:
skulmod:Bonepile 1 (2).
Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.
Apply 1 (2) Weak.

cards.name: Rain of Darts
cards.description: Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies between 0 and 3 (5) times.

cards.name: Rapid Channel
cards.description:
Borrow 1 (2) [E] from future turns.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Reload
cards.description:
Evoke ALL orbs.
Channel 2 (3) skulmod:Cannonballs.

cards.name: Rising Slash
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage to ALL enemies 1 (2) time (times).
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Russian Roulette
cards.description:
Randomly skulmod:Gamble 2 (3) times, deal 12 (18) damage, or take 6 (9) damage.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Shield Charge
cards.description:
Gain 10 (14) Block.
Gain 10 (14) Block next turn.

cards.name: Shield Rush
cards.description: Gain 4 Block 2 (3) times.

cards.name: Simplicity
cards.description:
skulmod:Bonepile 2 (3).
Channel 2 skulmod:Empty_Head.

cards.name: Surprise Knives!
cards.description:
Exhaust the top 2 cards of your draw pile.
Gain [E] equal to their combined cost.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Tax Strike
cards.description:
Deal 5 (8) damage.
Draw 1 card.
Channel 1 (2) skulmod:Empty_Head.

cards.name: The Best Offense
cards.description:
Convert your Block into Dexterity until your next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: The God of War
cards.description:
*Passive: Skills or 0-cost cards grant skulmod:Tactics.
Bonepile: Gain 1 Tactics.
Swap: Increase an Unrivaled Strike's damage by 5.

cards.name: Throw Gold
cards.description:
skulmod:Pay 20 (10) Gold.
Deal 0 damage, equal to the Gold gained this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Two In One Hand
cards.description:
Draw 2 (4) cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wait To Strike
cards.description:
Gain 3 (5) Vigor.
If you haven't played an Attack this turn, gain 3 (5) more.

cards.name: Abyss Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
skulmod:Concentration damages ALL enemies an additional time when removed.

cards.name: All-In Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
At the start of their turn, EVERYONE skulmod:Gambles 2 (3) times.
If an enemy wins a Gamble, Gambler does too.

cards.name: Avenger Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
Gain [E] the first time you take or Block damage during your turn.

cards.name: Berserker
cards.description: skulmod:Passive: Losing HP grants as much skulmod:Unshackled. Fatal damage less than Strength heals you to half HP and applies skulmod:Bone_Scream.

cards.name: Champion
cards.description:
skulmod:Passive: skulmod:Counterattack unblocked damage.
skulmod:Bonepile: Heal the next 3 HP you lose.
skulmod:Swap: Enter or Exit Wrath.

cards.name: Combo
cards.description:
Deal 5 (8) damage X times.
skulmod:Bonepile X times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dark Charge
cards.description:
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).
Gain 12 (16) Block.

cards.name: Dark Cross
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage 2 (3) times.
Gain Block equal to your Vigor and skulmod:Oblivion.

cards.name: Davy Jones
cards.description:
skulmod:Passive: Gain Vigor on Evoke.
skulmod:Bonepile: Channel a skulmod:Cannonball.
skulmod:Swap: Channel 4 Cannonballs.

cards.name: Eternal Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
Drawing a card skulmod:Mills a card.

cards.name: Eye of the Storm
cards.description: Gain 6 (9) Block, applying Vigor.

cards.name: Focused Strike
cards.description:
Discard an Attack.
Gain Vigor equal to its damage.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Frost Skull
cards.description:
*Passive: Give Block lost at the start of the turn to ALL enemies.
Bonepile: Gain 1 skulmod:Frozen.
Swap: Channel 2 skulmod:Blizzards.

cards.name: Frozen Soul Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
If you end your turn with [E] , spend it to Channel 2 (3) skulmod:Blizzards for each [E] left.

cards.name: Guardian Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
For every 50 Block you gain, convert 2 (3) Dexterity to 2 (3) Strength.

cards.name: Hallo Hallo
cards.description:
Channel 6 (8) skulmod:Empty_Head.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Impregnable
cards.description:
Gain 5 (8) skulmod:Oblivion.
skulmod:Bonepile 2.

cards.name: Jack-In-The-Box!
cards.description:
Your next card will be played as if it were X-Cost, based on its cost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Joker Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
The first time each turn you play an skulmod:Imitation, skulmod:Bonepile.

cards.name: Nobeard Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
Retain Attacks, and Channel 1 (2) skulmod:Cannonball (Cannonballs) for each.

cards.name: Outlaw Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
At the end of each turn, gain 4 (5) Gold.

cards.name: Rage Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
Wrath is 2 times as effective.
Prevent Fatal damage in Wrath once.

cards.name: Rig The Game
cards.description:
Add 1 card from your draw pile to your hand.
Put 1 card from your hand on top of your draw pile.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Rip Pockets
cards.description:
Apply 10 (18) skulmod:Ripped_Pocket.
Gain 10 (18) Gold.

cards.name: Royal Flush
cards.description: skulmod:Gamble 7 times.

cards.name: Sage Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
Applying a power to an enemy deals 3 damage.

cards.name: Skull, Bone, Spirit
cards.description:
skulmod:Bonepile 4.
Channel 4 skulmod:Empty_Head.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Sniper Form
cards.description:
Ethereal.
 (*)Attacks apply Lock-On.
Skills grant Temporary Focus.
Attack damage is 3.

cards.name: Speedrun
cards.description: *Reshuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.

cards.name: Technical Jab
cards.description:
Deal 0 damage, equal to your missing health.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: The Absolute
cards.description:
*Passive: Playing a skulmod:Grapple grants skulmod:Herculean_Strength.
Bonepile: Complete 3 skulmod:Labors.
Swap: Complete 12 Labors and play a random Grapple.

cards.name: Warlord Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
The first Strike you play each turn has its cost reduced by 1 this combat.

relics.name: Reassembly
relics.description: Start with a random Skull. The first time you take Fatal damage, heal to 30 HP.
relics.flavorText: Bundle with Lizard Tail for maximum Reassemblage!

relics.name: Centauros
relics.description:
skulmod:Quintessence.
Once per combat, right click to deal 9 damage to a random enemy and inflict skulmod:Wedged_Spear.
relics.flavorText: "A race of half-human, half horse beings with high intelligence and excellent hunting skills."

relics.name: Luck Addiction
relics.description: When you lose a skulmod:Gamble, randomly deal damage equal to half your Strength, Dexterity, and Focus.
relics.flavorText: Sometimes it's the thrill that's more appealing than the reward. ...Not often.

relics.name: Prize Match
relics.description: When you end your turn in Wrath, gain 1 Strength. When you exit Wrath, lose ALL Strength gained from this relic.
relics.flavorText: Undefeated, living or dead. Not as far as you know, at least.

relics.name: Zoomies
relics.description: At the start of combat and each time you Reshuffle, shuffle an Acceleration into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: The hunt never ends, not unless the Witch says "Dinner Time". You don't have to be alive to enjoy good food.

relics.name: Slime King
relics.description: At the start of combat, add a copy of a random card you own to your hand. It varies between 25% and 200% effectiveness.

relics.name: *Altar of Speed
relics.description: A memory of what almost was. Right Click this at a Rest Site to spend 10 Bone Fragments to start combat with 1 Plated Armor, up to 8 stacks.
relics.flavorText: It was so useful you decided to take it with you.

relics.name: *Altar of Strength
relics.description: A memory of what almost was. Right Click this at a Rest Site to spend 10 Bone Fragments to gain 1 Vigor each turn, up to 8 stacks.
relics.flavorText: It was so useful you decided to take it with you.

relics.name: *Altar of Vitality
relics.description: A memory of what almost was. Right Click this at a Rest Site to spend 20 Bone Fragments to gain 4 Max HP, up to 28 HP.
relics.flavorText: It was so useful you decided to take it with you.

relics.name: *Bone Fragments
relics.description: A memory of what almost was. A pouch that holds Bone Fragments obtained by shattering skulmod:Skulls. You can use them with Altar relics to gain permanent scaling stats.
relics.flavorText: You're a skeleton so you have a use for these, right?

relics.name: *Swap Button
relics.description: Right Click to skulmod:Swap to your inactive skulmod:Skull. Has no cooldown.
relics.flavorText: It's a little worn out, but that adds character. An item used for testing that some might find useful to explore the mod.

relics.name: Bestest Friend
relics.description:
Occasionally finds flowers that heal 1-4 HP after combat.
You don't think you could un-live with yourself if anything happened to her.
relics.flavorText: She's good enough at hide and seek that you don't feel at all worried about the monsters finding her.

relics.name: Hunter's Gift
relics.description: On pickup, choose a skulmod:Skull to add to your deck.
relics.flavorText: Another one? You're greedy like an ogre.

relics.name: Original Iced Tea (a lot of ice)
relics.description: Prevent the next 44 HP you would have lost.
relics.flavorText: The Death Knight's favorite drink, there's so much ice you can hide behind it.

relics.name: Bottled Violence
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose any card in your deck. It's treated as a Strike.
relics.flavorText: For your safety, please do not unbottle him. He's been charging up a long time in there.

relics.name: Dark Mirror
relics.description:
Upon pickup, obtain an additional copy of a card in your deck.
If that card is a Skull, create a random rare Skull instead.
relics.flavorText: The world looks funny in this.

potions.name: Unstable Quartz
potions.description:
Pay 1 [E] to Swap.
Unaffected by Potency.

keywords.name: Absolute Zero
keywords.description:
3: Once every two turns, Evoking channels a Frost orb.
5: At the start of your turn, Evoke an orb.
Masterpiece 6: Gain 1 Focus.

keywords.name: Arrow
keywords.description:
Evoke: Deal 3 damage. Evoke ALL other arrows.
Passive: Channel 1 Arrow at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Artifact
keywords.description:
2: Channel a Meteor at the start of combat.
5: Channel a Meteor every 3 turns.
Masterpiece 6: Gain 1 Focus.

keywords.name: Barrier
keywords.description:
Passive: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Dexterity until your next turn.
Evoke: Gain 1 Dexterity until your next turn.

keywords.name: Bleached
keywords.description: Card cannot be Duplicated, Double Tapped, Burst, or Amplified.

keywords.name: Blizzard
keywords.description:
Passive: At the end of your turn, ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Block, up to 2.
Evoke: EVERYONE gains 2 Block.

keywords.name: Bone
keywords.description: 3: Your first Swap each combat will grant Buffer.

keywords.name: Bone Scream
keywords.description: At the end of the turn, remove all powers and die. When dealing Fatal Attack damage, remove this. During Boss or Elite combat, die next turn instead.

keywords.name: Bonepile
keywords.description:
A triggered effect based on your active Skull.
Defaults to 2 Block.

keywords.name: Burn
keywords.description: Unblocked Non-Attack damage against the owner will be doubled once.

keywords.name: Cannonball
keywords.description: Evoke: Add a Fire! to your hand, or increase the damage if you already have one. Every fourth Cannonball is enhanced.

keywords.name: Charge
keywords.description: After gathering 5 stacks, choose an Attack. It becomes a 3 cost Strike with increased effects.

keywords.name: Charged
keywords.description:
Warrior can Charge cards.
A Charged card's cost becomes 3, and its effects increase based on the cost increase.
Charged cards are treated as Strikes.

keywords.name: Concentration
keywords.description: Deals damage when reduced. When removed, deal the total damage dealt to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Counterattack
keywords.description: Deal non-attack damage equal to the unblocked damage taken.

keywords.name: Courage
keywords.description:
3: Gain 1 Strength.
5: Gain 2 Strength.

Masterpiece
8: Gain 4 Strength.

keywords.name: Embrace
keywords.description: Temporarily lose HP until the start of your next turn. You can die from the HP loss.

keywords.name: Empty Head
keywords.description: Evoke: Bonepile

keywords.name: Excessive Bleeding
keywords.description:
3: Your first attack each turn Wounds the target for half its damage.
4: Your first attack each turn Wounds the target for full damage.
Masterpiece 6: Your Wounding attacks deal 20% more damage.

keywords.name: Fortress
keywords.description:
2: Gain 2 Block each turn, affected by Dexterity.
5: Gain 2 more Block each turn.
Masterpiece 6: Gain 2 Dexterity.

keywords.name: Frozen
keywords.description: You take and deal 1 less damage this turn.

keywords.name: Gamble
keywords.description: 20% chance to gain 1 Strength, Dexterity, or Focus.

keywords.name: Grapple
keywords.description: A 2 damage Attack that costs 0 and Retains. At 3 or more stacks of Herculean Strength, they become Enhanced.

keywords.name: Harvest
keywords.description:
Apply the following to EVERYONE:
20 Souls: 2 Strength.
40 Souls: 2 Vulnerable.
60+ Souls: YOU become immune to death this turn.

keywords.name: Herculean Strength
keywords.description: Until the end of the turn, exponentially increases the damage of all Grapples by 50% per stack.

keywords.name: Imitation
keywords.description: A random card of any color. Its cost becomes 0 and it Purges. Imitations in your hand are Purged when you play a card.

keywords.name: Item
keywords.description: Increase the listed Set Effect permanently on pickup. Purges at the start of combat if it has no other effects.

keywords.name: Labor
keywords.description: After completing 12 Labors, add a random Grapple to your hand.

keywords.name: Masterpiece
keywords.description:
3: Gain 1 Strength, Dexterity, and Focus.
5: Unlock the Masterpiece effect of all your current sets.

keywords.name: Meteor
keywords.description: Evoke: Randomly deal b1 damage 1 time.

keywords.name: Mill
keywords.description: Discard a card from the top of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest should use _ to replace spaces and be entirely lowercase. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

keywords.name: Oblivion
keywords.description:
Reduce the next unblocked damage you take once.
Once per turn, increase the next damage you deal.

keywords.name: Omen
keywords.description:
1: Take 50% more damage.
2: Take 100% more damage.
3: Take 150% more damage.

keywords.name: Passive
keywords.description: A constant effect provided by the active Skull.

keywords.name: Pay
keywords.description: Use Gold to play this card. Cannot be played without Gold.

keywords.name: Peerless
keywords.description: Cost has been increased, and the attack has become single target. Refund twice the card's cost when played.

keywords.name: Quintessence
keywords.description: You can use this relic at ANY time, including the enemy's turn.

keywords.name: Revenge
keywords.description:
3: Inflict 25% of the first damage you take each turn to the attacker as Revenge.
5: The Revenge applied becomes 50%.
Masterpiece 6: Also gain [E] the turn after you take unblocked damage.

keywords.name: Ripped Pocket
keywords.description: Attacking the target removes half of this, at least 5, and grants Gold equal to that amount.

keywords.name: Skull
keywords.description:
Your active Skull changes your Passive and Bonepile. If you own more than 2 Skulls at the start of combat, shatter your choice until you have 2.

Skulls are always Exhausted, cannot upgrade, and cannot be bottled.

keywords.name: Soul
keywords.description: A permanent power. As Grim Reaper, Attacks kill units under a percentage of YOUR missing HP, based on your Souls.

keywords.name: Stamina
keywords.description: Reduce this to heal after taking damage.

keywords.name: Swap
keywords.description: Your inactive Skull becomes active and triggers its Swap effect.

keywords.name: Tactics
keywords.description: After contemplating 8 strategies, create a Strategy Book in your hand.

keywords.name: Total Cards
keywords.description: The sum of your discard pile, draw pile, and hand.

keywords.name: Unshackled
keywords.description: The next time you start or end your turn, gain 1 Strength.

keywords.name: Wedged Spear
keywords.description: After 3 turns or when the target dies, refresh the cooldown of Centauros.

keywords.name: This is displayed in the tooltip.
keywords.description: This is displayed in the tooltip. Note, spaces are not allowed in NAMES. Also, they should be entirely lowercase. For multi-word keywords, see the next one.

keywords.name: Grit
keywords.description: Retain the next 1 Block you'd lose at the start of the turn.

keywords.name: Unobstructed
keywords.description: Damage not prevented by emporary HP or Block.

mods.name: skulmod
mods.description:
Reassemble, rise, and re-rise again! 
 Skul, Hero Slayer, Little Bone, no matter what you call him it won’t change that he’s here for another adventure! The last skeleton and the hero of Demonkind in their hour of need, Little Bone ascends the spire in search of the new source of Dark Quartz spreading across Harmonia. Will he make it to the top to put an end to this once and for all, or will he end up disassembled at the foot of the spire?
